00037 #ifndef DIGITAL_OUTPUT_HPP
00038 #define DIGITAL_OUTPUT_HPP
00039 
00040 
00041 #include "DigitalOutInterface.hpp"
00042 
00043 namespace RTT
00044 { namespace dev {
00045 
00055     class RTT_API DigitalOutput
00056     {
00057     public:
00065         DigitalOutput( DigitalOutInterface* dig_out, unsigned int relay_nr, bool _invert=false )
00066             : board( dig_out ), relaynumber( relay_nr ), invert(_invert)
00067         {}
00068 
00073         DigitalOutput ( bool initial_state = false )
00074             : board( 0 ), relaynumber( 0 ), invert(initial_state)
00075         {}
00076 
00077 
00081         ~DigitalOutput()
00082         {}
00083 
00088         void setBit( bool on_off )
00089         {
00090             if(board)
00091                 board->setBit( relaynumber, on_off != invert );
00092             else
00093                 invert=on_off;
00094         }
00095 
00099         void switchOn()
00100         {
00101             if(board)
00102                 board->setBit( relaynumber, !invert );
00103             else
00104                 invert=true;
00105         }
00106 
00110         void switchOff()
00111         {
00112             if(board)
00113                 board->setBit( relaynumber, invert );
00114             else
00115                 invert=false;
00116         }
00117 
00123         bool isOn() const
00124         {
00125             if(board)
00126                 return invert != board->checkBit( relaynumber );
00127             else
00128                 return invert;
00129         }
00130 
00131     private:
00132         DigitalOutInterface *board;
00133         unsigned int relaynumber;
00134         bool invert;
00135     };
00136 }}
00137 
00138 #endif
